replies.replyComment: This is not necessary, but I do drive in SL and in Europe, so you do not have to give me shitty advices, just keep it to yourself, man! "kunuharupa shower?" You are the one who wrote those first and deleted it again, do not try to be smart asshol, man! Enough is enough! I do not want "ANY MORE" further dialogue with you and the subject is closed! Got it?

"Do you deny that there was no such payment?" Even this is true or false, we do only through media, so, it could not a fake, or a fake! But the readers can only get the info and one can not say "yes" or no" based on none seen object, i.e.: the Cheque!

I am not going after politicians' private life info, instead, their results! That is what matters whether they are robbers or not. Ok, if they are, why the people like you want it to nail down them after ending a more than 30 yrs of Terror in SL? If that the case, do you people have a proper candidate to lead the country in to a prosperous land? It is true that all most all politicos are currupt and no one is there with a pristine clean character.
About Basil, as far as I know, Basil is not a good person to be in the politics and his wifes cases, I do not know, if the case is true, she should get the proper punishments.
PS.: For this:The poor peasant Riding a Puttalam Buruwa; Did i insult you like this? Who the F*ck are you? What do you think who you are? You are the real Buuruwa, who may have a bunch of Monkeys als followers! Or Meharaka, they also have only Meeharak as their followers! Just piss off you Bastard!
Cloud Nine well said. You sound so genuine. We need a whole new generation of you and your clones!  I too wish good luck to Rev Amila Thero.

Thanks for your saying "I don‚Äôt think you could ever comprehend the truth"! :-) Wow! I admire you highly for your excellent capabilities to recognize such a task!!
Said that, I do not want to waste my time with people like you who knows truly the @TRUTH@ of the Sri Lankas situations and in a position to safeguard it from ALL of its economic, social, cultural integrity of the country as a whole lastly the worst ever political standards from the on going heinous enemy activities on the Lankan soil! I do not have to mention here the enemies of SL since you know them much better than I do;
I wish you guys all the best and to take the leadership to protect our country rather than the mere lip services which most of are doing!
Hope you will be successful practically! So, buckle it up bro..
The subject is closed, cheers!
PS. Ah, by the way thanks for the link, but I have seen a lot of Videos, from him :-)

Cloud Nine I agree with you entirely. My sadness is Srilanka is doomed. With the kind of political immaturity in our people the politicians will make hay with racist and caste based politics. My regret is during our life time we will not see this country coming out of this quagmire. People like Rev Amila are desperately trying to wake up the public but with no success.

loneranger cristo I don‚Äôt think you could ever comprehend the truth. I can only recommend you to see this clip which might brings some clarity if you are receptive enough. https://youtu.be/sVehHZ55mUs

You are complete out of the context.Stay on this objectively. Do not try to give unnecessary critics of a user saying "shallow understanding, etc. which is a main complex in our Sinhala society! 
Said that, you do not have to go back to 70 yrs, bla..bla.. , and even to our great periods of Anuradhapura.
This is about how those above three doing, working and talking at the "present."
If you know about NGOs, and about these three let us know, right now without circling around the subject, who are asking punishments for Soldiers of Army who fought scarified everything (extremely hard work) for our country and given a real freedom for everyone of us!

loneranger cristo you show how shallow your understanding of the real betrayers of this country,  which at independence in 1948 was the second richest country in Asia with a sound export economy and surplus in the treasury. After 70 years now we are up to the neck in debt, unable to pay back and giving away our land, while sending our women to to slave in the Middle East to bring home meagre FE that too is pilfered by the stupid and corrupt politicians.

May be, but these morons are real betrayers of Sri Lanka. And just working for foreign entities covered by the names like NGO. They believe and trust only the out siders! One day, these gusy MUST be punished severely!
loneranger cristo one can wake up a sleeping man but it‚Äôs impossible to wake up a man who is pretending to be asleep!
